title: Pixel 3 not charging with INBOX adapter only
content:
My phone does not charge with charger that I got with my phone. The Charger charges at 5 With  3Amps
but I am able to charge using the google wireless charging pad as well as with my powerbank that supplies power at 5V 3.1 A

Google support says to factory reset my phone. Is there anything else I can do?

I have tried, safe mode reboot as well as use other 18W chargers, only the inbox charger does not charge the phone.

I use the inbox charger to charge my power bank and the use powerbank to charge the phone, which means charger is also working perfectly.
